name: Avrora
description:
Team: Meteor

Game description:
Avrora is an atmospheric 2D platform game in a dark dungeon. 
Little girl Avrora starts on a journey to find her parents and dispel the darkness that has covered the whole world.
Keep the light shining, or you will die!

Controls:
Arrows/WASD - movement
SPACE - jump
Esc - pause menu/intro skip

=================================================
Artist: Viktor Kevrukh (Instagram)
Programmer: Yurii Shalia
Composer: Aram Martirosyan
Gamedesign: Roman Tsyrul
Narrative: Timirlan Kenzhibaev
